title: Intimate Drops (feat. Calise Hawkins, Justin Silver, Joe DeRosa & Ralph Sutton)
description: Dan innocently incorporates a beloved Bonfire drop into a very intimate moment. Calise Hawkins discusses having sleep paralysis. Dan’s mom, Trish, starts him on the road to being a swinger at a very young age. Joe DeRosa guest host. Ralph Sutton has an accident (in his pants) on the streets of New York and Jay and Joe can relate. Dan reminisces about being strung along by two women he was in love with for years.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
